description: Partial approval of details application pursuant to Condition 4 (Materials) - parts c), f), g), and h) only - of planning consent ref: P2022/1001/S73, dated 23/12/2022.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions:
INFORMATIVE: You are advised that this decision notice grants approval of parts c), f), g), and h) of Condition 4 of planning permission ref: P2022/1001/S73, dated 23/12/2022, only.

Parts a), b), c), e) and f) of Condition 3 of planning permission ref: P2019/3572/S73 were previously discharged under application ref: P2022/1046/AOD, approved 04/07/2022. Part i) of Condition 3 of planning permission ref: P2019/3572/S73 was approved via application ref: P2022/2420/AOD, dated 10/10/2022. 

You are advised that the details submitted as part of the applications listed above are considered sufficient to deem parts a), b), c), d), e), and h) of Condition 4 discharged.

You are advised Condition 4 of planning permission ref: P2022/1001/S73 is now considered fully discharged.
